summary: Turbulent, then tragic, marital relationship resulting in wife getting the upper hand from oppressive husband, on a post second world war farmstead.
cast: Regina Linnanheimo|Kullervo Kalske|Eric Gustafson|Aku Peltonen|Elli Ylimaa|Oscar Tengström|Kaija Suonio|Lauri Korpela|Ruth Luoma-Aho|Matti Oravisto|Matti Aulos|Helvi Järveläinen|Eero Leväluoma|Veikko Linna|Sven Relander|F.E. Sillanpää|Senja Soitso|Olga Tainio|Waldemar Wohlström
title: Intohimon vallassa
